title: Vaccine bootcamp
description: The global race to develop a COVID-19 vaccine is on. Here are the different types of vaccines and how your body uses them to develop immunity.

title: Battleground polling
description: Polling in six key states for the 2020 election

title: The scale of coronavirus deaths
description: Global deaths from COVID-19 have exceeded one million, according to a Reuters tally, in another grim milestone for the global pandemic.

title: Shifting smoke
description: How wildfires ravaging the U.S. west coast are sending smoke between continents and up to record heights in the atmosphere.
